= Journal 2024-12-01 =

== Pre-Commit Lint Git Commit Messages ==
:pre-commit:git:gitlint:

- [[https://www.conventionalcommits.org/en/v1.0.0/|ConventionalCommits.org]]
- [[https://jorisroovers.com/gitlint/|Gitlint]]

  `.gitlint`:

  {{{conf
  [general]
  # You HAVE to add the rule to [general] to enable it
  # Only configuring (such as below) does NOT enable it.
  contrib =
    - contrib-title-conventional-commits
    - contrib-allowed-authors

  # Setting contrib rule options is identical to configuring other rules
  [contrib-title-conventional-commits]
  types = bugfix,user-story,epic
  }}}

  `.pre-commit-config.yaml`:

  {{{yaml
  - repo: https://github.com/jorisroovers/gitlint
    rev: v0.19.1
    hooks:
      - id: gitlint
        stages: [commit-msg]
  }}}
